name: Exploding Colors
description:
*Forgot to say that you should press left or right to begin the game or tutorial.

You play as an UFO which is powered by colors. However, you must avoid them as you dodge the space wall and dash through rocks. Try to beat my high score of 35. Once you get to 50, the difficulty stops increasing so if you want to have a harder goal, try getting to 50.  We only had like 1 Day to make this so the game's kinda sucks. Also there's a  bug where it won't proceed to the losing screen.

Credits:

Takago - Programmer, (Sort of) Vector Artist, SFX Artist

Miyaki - Other Artist

Wolfgang - Chase! (Music Track)
